mapper.update: update account set acc_name = #{accName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, role_name = #{roleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, acc_createtime = #{accCreatetime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, acc_createman = #{accCreateman,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, acc_password = #{accPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, acc_updatetime = #{accUpdatetime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, acc_updateman = #{accUpdateman,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, acc_spare = #{accSpare,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where acc_id = #{accId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select acc_id, acc_name, role_name, acc_createtime, acc_createman, acc_password, acc_updatetime, acc_updateman, acc_spare from account where acc_id = #{accId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select acc_id, acc_name, role_name, acc_createtime, acc_createman, acc_password, acc_updatetime, acc_updateman, acc_spare from account
